review: I love the idea of this, but I haven't been impressed with its performance. No matter where it is in relation to the router, I get glitching, lag, and occasional freeze-ups while streaming. I can sit in the exact same room and stream something on my tablet with NO issues, yet I always have trouble with the Fire TV. I even had it replaced once thinking maybe it was just a bad unit - that didn't help. Overall, it's ok, but it often tends to be more frustrating than not.
author: Jodi Hoyt

review: The Firestick probably works well, but SlingTV is a disaster. Therefore I can't say if the Firestick would work or not. Sorry, I have told SlingTV to remove me from their subscriptions. Maybe I will try another provider.
author: mark pearlman

review: I'm really happy with our new Fire Stick.  It has great response time and the remote make it simple to use.  We made the decision to drop cable and go with streaming services.  We already had Amazon Prime and Netflix and then we added Hulu to the mix.  I can't say that I miss cable and the $70 a month I'm saving paid for the Fire stick the first month we had it.  I think that integration with the Amazon Echo would be awesome for voice commands.  Hopefully something like that is coming soon.  The only downside to it is the lack of an app for Windows Phone.  I hope that an app to support Windows will be coming soon.  Overall it is a GREAT product!
author: Kris B.

review: I love my fire stick. the apps are easy to navigate and the installation, if you really want to call it that, was super easy. Would definitely recommend this.

review: Bought this so we could watch prime and netflix however it kinda blows. It constantly buffers and yes we have an awesome internet connection, secured network and great wifi. Worked well for a few months and i even recommended it to all my friends. Guess will either buy the roku or the bigger box fire tv. It's a shame it was such a nice idea.
